effect.black_white: For five turns (including this one), passive effects of held items are ignored, and Pokémon will not use their held items.
effect.black_2_white_2: For five turns (including this one), passive effects of held items are ignored, and Pokémon will not use their held items.

short_effect.black_white: Negates held items for five turns.
short_effect.black_2_white_2: Negates held items for five turns.

flavor_text.black_white: The user creates a bizarre area in which Pokémon’s held items lose their effects for five turns.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: The user creates a bizarre area in which Pokémon’s held items lose their effects for five turns.
